    • addPart

      public void addPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Add a Part to the Inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when add part button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by FXMLoader if fxml file could not load

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens Product Form with an auto-generated ID and blank fields. Product is not added until saved in Product View. RUNTIME ERROR could not add Part if Product table was empty. Solved by assigning ID if product table empty
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when add product button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by FXMLoader if fxml file could not load

    • deletePart

      public void deletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes a Part from the inventory. Generates an error message if part not deleted.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when delete part button clicked

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Delete a Product from the Inventory if and only if no Parts are associated with it. Generates error message if Product not deleted.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when delete product button clicked

    • exitMain

      protected void exitMain()
      Exits program

    • modifyPart

      public void modifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens the Part Form and fills fields with information from selected Part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when modify part button clicked*
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by FXMLoader if fxml file could not load

    • modifyProduct

      public void modifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens the Product Form and fills fields and table with information from selected Product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - when Modify Product button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by FXMLoader if fxml file could not load

    • searchPart

      public void searchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Search for a part by ID and Name. Returns a list of Parts with the name containing search string and/or ID value. If blank, resets to all Products. RUNTIME ERROR getCharacters() returns a CharSequence, requires toString() to cast instead of (String)
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when enter pressed while search bar selected

    • searchProduct

      public void searchProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Search for a part by ID and Name. Returns a list of Parts with the name containing search string and/or ID value. If blank, resets to all Products.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - triggered when enter pressed while search bar selected

    • updatePartTable

      public void updatePartTable()
      Updates part table with latest parts

      public void updateProductTable()
